data.title: bakery and specialty sweets from birthday cakes to Italian pastries
data.text: Delicious, beautifully made and reasonable prices. Also has a cafe within the bakery. Just ask the owners for a special cake and your wish is their command

data.title: Rehearsal dinner dessert
data.text:
On the advice of my future daughter-in-las, I ordered 2 cakes for the rehearsal dinner dessert....chocolate cannoli and carrot .
They were FABULOUS....I would highly recommend this bakery.
They also did the reception dessert table of Italian pasteries and they were also wonderful!!!

data.title: Wedding Cake
data.text: This is a long overdue review, but we were so happy I want to make sure to give credit! We ordered a two tier, chocolate cake, with white frosting, and white cannoli filling, for 140 ppl for our wedding last spring, and it was FANTASTIC. Deserts Beyond the Ordinary was very accommodating during the tasting, ordering, and deliver process. On top of that, we just defrosted our cake topper for our 1 year anniversary and it still tasted AMAZING. Very professional and talented.

data.title: Visit
data.text: Wonderful desserts can order ahead for parties. Have lunch sandwiches, salads. However desserts are the attraction, they are wonderful. Can order for parties etc.

data.title: pumpkin cheesecake
data.text: love the consistency of the cheesecake. the flavor comes through, not all taste the same. This is a go to and not to be disappointed in the product.   The raspberry cheesecake is sooo good. If only they could remove the calories.

data.title: My favorite bakery!!
data.text: The desserts they make are delicious. We won't buy our cakes anywhere else! Strawberry Bavarian cream is my favorite. The cream cups with strawberries are amazing. I love everything they sell. They do a fantastic job

data.title: the best in town
data.text: the products available at Desserts Beyond the Ordinary are some of the best that I've ever had and I have traveled all over the country and love my sweet treats. keep up the good work and remember to support the local businesses before we lose them

data.title: outstanding
data.text: no downside.  they make anything you want, anytime, and they are one of the few places to live up to their name.

data.title: Disappointed...
data.text: I can say that I haven't actually eaten here but have heard how wonderful their pastries are, plus the photos are really enticing.  They are open Saturdays from 9-12, so one Saturday, I drove from my house (about 12 miles...especially with the price of gas!) and got there about 10:00.  They had a couple of pusties in the case.  That was it.  Said that if I wanted to come back in an hour, they would have lobster tails ready (but apparently, no other pastries).  To me, if you are only open for 3 hours, then you should have your product available for purchase when you open.  To only have items available for an hour?  And only a couple of different ones at that?  Not acceptable!

data.title: Great lunches and desserts
data.text: This is great place for lunch, especially for those on their lunch break from work. They seat you quickly, give you enough time to look at the menu, they take your order and then before you know it your food is coming out. Everything is always tasty and fresh and the staff is very friendly. They have mostly sandiches on rolls and different breads, soups and salads on the menu but wait until you get to their dessert counter! They have great variety of yummy choices and everything they have is reasonably priced, including the lunches.

data.title: Excellent!!
data.text: When I worked in Utica I use to go here frequently!! Best canolie ever!!, plus so much more.. if I am anywhere close.. I make the stop!! Its worth it!!

data.title: Wedding cake
data.text: This place is a hidden gem on Bank place in Utica! Amazing food, and the best part is the desserts. They also can make the best wedding cakes around for a great price. Try the Godiva chocolate cake, it is to die for!!!!

data.title: Desserts Beyond the Ordinary
data.text:
Desserts Beyond the Ordinary is a local, independent cafe located on a quaint downtown side street next to a gold-domed bank… and one of my favorite lunch spots. Menu includes sandwiches like Pepper and Egg, Capicola with Roasted Peppers and Blackened Chicken with Cajun Mayo. Daily soup, salad and pannini too.

But what you really came here for is the dessert. The best cakes in town: Strawberry Bavarian, Bailey’s Chocolate and the Carrot are my favs, but honestly you can’t go wrong. Local specialties like canoli, pusties and cheesecake are good to take home for later. They make tasty wedding cakes too, if you are in the market. Check hours first, they can change.
